title: Coinbase to Slow Hiring Spree as Users Drop Off
sub_head: The crypto exchange’s stock price has fallen 74% so far this year
body:
Coinbase Global Inc., the largest U.S.-based crypto company, will slow its pace of hiring amid a crash in the crypto markets.
The announcement was made privately to employees and later in a statement by President and Chief Operating Officer Emilie Choi posted on the company’s blog.
